ls-aliases.zsh.ls: Basic listing with directories first, show icons if possible.
ls-aliases.zsh.la: Show all files, including hidden ones, using ls.
ls-aliases.zsh.ll: Show a long list with group info using ls.
ls-aliases.zsh.lla: Show all files (including hidden) in long list format.
ls-aliases.zsh.llh: Show long list with a header row.
ls-aliases.zsh.llha: Show all files in long list format with a header row.
ls-aliases.zsh.lta: Directory tree view, show all files including hidden.
ls-aliases.zsh.ltag: Directory tree view, show all files (including hidden), respect .gitignore.
ls-aliases.zsh.lr: Recursively list all directories and files.
ls-aliases.zsh.lra: Recursively list all files, including hidden.
ls-aliases.zsh.lonea: List one file per line, including hidden files.
ls-aliases.zsh.lgit: Show git status and info in listing.
ls-aliases.zsh.lgittree: Show directory tree view with git info.
ls-aliases.zsh.ltime: Sort listing by last modified time.
ls-aliases.zsh.ls-sort: Sort listing using arbitrary field (Usage: ls-sort size [-a])
ls-aliases.zsh.lextend: Show extended attributes in long listing.
ls-aliases.zsh.lctx: Show security context in long listing.
ls-aliases.zsh.linode: Show inode numbers in long listing.
ls-aliases.zsh.lcolor: Show listing with colored output based on file sizes.
ls-aliases.zsh.lbig: Show listing with binary size units.
ls-aliases.zsh.labs: Show absolute paths in long listing.
ls-aliases.zsh.llinks: Show hard links in long listing.
ls-aliases.zsh.loctal: Show file permissions in octal notation.
ls-aliases.zsh.lno: Minimalist long listing with no extra details (no perms, size, user, time).
ls-aliases.zsh.lano: Minimalist long listing (including hidden) with no extra details.
ls-aliases.zsh.laccess: Show long listing sorted by access time.
ls-aliases.zsh.lcreate: Show long listing sorted by creation time.
ls-aliases.zsh.lchange: Show long listing sorted by change time.
ls-aliases.zsh.lall: Show everything with all extra info (full details).
ls-aliases.zsh.dls: Run eza as root using doas, with directories first and icons.

Go up one directory (equivalent to cd ../).
Go up two directories (equivalent to cd ../../).
Go up three directories (equivalent to cd ../../../).
Go up four directories (equivalent to cd ../../../../).

bat.zsh.cat: Use bat as a replacement for cat.
bat.zsh.fzfcat: Use fzf with bat preview (line numbers, color, first 500 lines).
bat.zsh.catless: Show file using bat with plain style and always paging.
bat.zsh.cathead: Show file using bat with header style.
bat.zsh.catgrid: Show file using bat with grid style.
bat.zsh.catgit: Show file using bat with changes (git) style.
bat.zsh.catd: Show file using bat with default style.
bat.zsh.catfull: Show file using bat with full style.
bat.zsh.catn: Show file using bat with numbers style.

chezmoi.zsh.czcd: Open a shell in the source directory managed by chezmoi.
chezmoi.zsh.czd: Show the diff between the source state and the destination state.
chezmoi.zsh.cza: Apply changes from chezmoi source to destination (update dotfiles).
chezmoi.zsh.czea: Edit a source file and immediately apply changes.
chezmoi.zsh.czaa: Add a file or directory to chezmoi source state.
chezmoi.zsh.czr: Re-add a file to chezmoi (updates source state from destination).
chezmoi.zsh.czup: Update chezmoi source state from upstream (pull changes) and apply.
chezmoi.zsh.czupup: Upgrade chezmoi to the latest version.
chezmoi.zsh.czgen: Generates output for use with chezmoi.
chezmoi.zsh.czs: Show the status of chezmoi-managed files.
chezmoi.zsh.czrm: Forget (remove) a file or directory from chezmoi source state.
chezmoi.zsh.czdoc: Run chezmoi diagnostics (doctor) to check for issues.
chezmoi.zsh.czi: List files and directories ignored by chezmoi.
chezmoi.zsh.czx: Render and execute a chezmoi template.
chezmoi.zsh.czm: List files and directories managed by chezmoi.
chezmoi.zsh.czt: Show chezmoi-managed files and directories as a tree.
chezmoi.zsh.czg: Pass git commands through to the chezmoi-managed repo.

misc.zsh.reload: Reload the current zsh configuration file (.zshrc).
misc.zsh.hreload: Restart the shell by re-executing zsh.
misc.zsh.rc-cursor: Reset the terminal cursor to its default style.
misc.zsh.ji: Interactively jump to directories using zoxide and fzf.
